instructions:
Prepare charcoal or gas grill. Place ham steaks on grill over medium-high heat. Grill ham steaks 3 to 5 minutes per side, turning once.
Mix together all ingredients for salsa.
Serve Ham Steak with a side of Pineapple-Green Onion Salsa.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) Cook's® brand Bone-in Ham Steaks
2 cups fresh ripe pineapple, trimmed, cored and chopped into 3/8-inch to 1/2-inch chunks
1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, with pulp
1/2 red bell pepper, cored and minced, 1/8-inch to 1/4-inch
title: Pineapple-Green Onion Salsa with Cook's Ham Steak
